name: SKUnlockDevice
summary: A pod for one-line code of asking user to unlock device within app for security reasons using passcode or fingerprint supporting iOS 8 onwards.
description: With the help of this pod, you can inject a code in your project for authentication mechanism. For example, user should unlock and use the app. Unlock mechanism should be same as device lock. In such case, you can use this pod. All the best. Cheers.
